participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and responsible, Emily is focused on her education and balancing work. She values friendship and independence.
participant_1.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i do not like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit rebellious, Raj enjoys expressing himself through his music preferences and coaching. He often seeks adventure and new experiences.
participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
